titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "Complaint Free Wednesday".
Supporting the goals and ideals of "Complaint Free Wednesday".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Complaint Free Wednesday.
Encourages each person in the United States to remember that having a positive life begins with having a positive attitude.
Recognizes and reaffirms the meaning of Thanksgiving by asking each person in the United States to use Complaint Free Wednesday to refrain from complaining and prepare for a day of gratitude.
